title: Hoops Tonight - Previewing the Conference Finals
itunes:title: Hoops Tonight - Previewing the Conference Finals
description:
Jason previews both the Western and Eastern Conference finals.  He breaks down key matchups and gives his predictions for both series. #Herd

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
